name: Circle of Warding
desc:
You inscribe a magic circle around you that repels outside forces. No summoned or reanimated creature can affect you in any way while you remain inside the circle, nor can they move through the circle.

The spell ends if you exit the circle.
(Reanimated is a condition applied by spells and effects that are very clearly Necromancy, such as Puppeteer. "Natural" undead not under a spell are unaffected.)
author: CrusaderDroid
